column7: Many choices of beer and good prices
column9:
Ariman is a must. Historic vibe, creative & fulfilling recipes, and no entitlement's clicks.
If you are in Lund must visit.
Great place to go by your own or with friends to have coffee, bear or eat something. Good attention and great environment.
Student ambiance with a very nice staff. This is where you should go if you want to eat a nice homemade sandwich with really fresh ingredients. Very nice selection of beer and Wine. Faire prices.
Bad atmosphere, and terrible guards which are negative, self centered and inconsistent. Couldn't recommend this bar to anyone. Better go to tbar :)

column7: Fun with a great buzz, but expensive
column9: A really good atmosphere, and a great selection of international and local beers.  Lots of students, and lots of laughter.  It was too expensive to stay for long, however
Bohemian, nice coffee and bar. Nice location, good music. Recommended for having á quick drink or á coffee and a cake.

The place has a very apparent socialist vibe, but the staff don't really show much brotherly love. They are often quite disinterested in the customer and easily annoyed. The food is bland and really only worth it if you can't be bothered to walk 5m...More

column7: Cool pub/cafe with some bar food as well
column9: This bohemian pub/cafe is best for late night visits when the music is loud and the people are in a party mode. They have an ok sortiment for beers and drinks and the pricing is good. The food though comes second hand although they have...More
Some say it is the only truly student bar in Lund (except of the nations which are not accessible for non-students). So go there, have a beer and enjoy the ngiht.
Go to place to hang out in smaller groups. You can borrow a chess board and pieces and sit down and enjoy the atmosphere for a while. Good selections of beers as well, like Guinness!

Today it was coffee and a little something to go with it.  A nice chat with the man behind the counter.  However, today there was a terrible smell that I had never noticed there before.  I hope it is temporary.

column7: This place is an institution in Lund
column9: Great place with a run down feeling. For decades a meeting place for students and people who avoid the mainstream-boring-cafés. Good sandwiches and coffee very close to the cathedral and the museum Kulturen. Sitting outside with a beer on a sunny spring afternoon is one...More
Go for a drink, meeting place for friends, on quite street facing the church with loud music and lots of action inside the cafe
If you are in Lund, do not miss it! The best place to have a beer and chat to friends and party as well!

column7: Excellent view to the Lund Cathedral + variety of beer
column9: To us this is a nice place to sense the historical greatness of the Lund Cathedral. We sat outdoors in the afternoon sun. We had coffee and two different beers (Irish and German). The cafe also offers beers from many other countries (and a menu)....More

column7: Cheap beers and open on sundays
column9: Frequented a lot from students, beers can be a little cheaper from other places and the place is open on Sundays (one of the few) until 12.

column7: for students-place you have to be in Lund
column9: The location is quite good, very close to the cathedral.It's a typical swedish coffeehouse on the one hand because you'll get all stuff like homemade cakes and sandwiches and coffees you expect. But on the other hand it's not swedish lagum (common).Ariman is more alternative...More
Arimans has the interior of a rubbish skip. The decor is disgusting with pieces of broken furniture. Certain members if staff have an attitude problem.
